resources.string:
To search for a recipe, enter keywords into the search bar on the home page.

 Once you've found a recipe you like, select it to save it to your Cookbook.

 If you decide you don't want it anymore, you can always delete it by selecting it again.

 Navigate to the Search page or Cookbook via the menu bar up top.

 Have fun and enjoy!
Recipe Search Version 1.0\nCreated by Jackson Coghill
